item.description:
Liz & Barney have been raving about this beach. I thought it was high time the group got a looksy... won't you join us?

DIRECTIONS
Go Rt 114 through Goffstown Village past Sully's Market on the right.
Continue on 114N for 1.3 mile to what is known as Parker Station on right. (sign there says Clough State Park.
Follow that winding Rd for 1.3 miles to River Rd on your right. (A sign is there after you make the sharp right)
After 2.5 miles take a right onto Clough Park Rd (you will turn right at a Quonset Hut bldg) Follow for 1.8 miles to Clough St Park and Everett Dam.
Park there and walk down paved way (5 minutes) to beach (after you see a Bath house and roofed picnic area)


Many thanks to Liz for these detailed directions.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Clough State Park - Weare, NH
